pull.title: Schnorr (Incremental) Half Aggregation
pull.body:
This ports over the work from b-wagn in https://github.com/BlockstreamResearch/secp256k1-zkp/pull/261

In the second commit I have [addressed the follow-ups](https://github.com/BlockstreamResearch/secp256k1-zkp/issues/291) though I was not always sure if I understood them correctly since they weren't inline. Please let me know if they are correct then I can squash the commit here and open it as a PR on zkp.

repo.name: secp256k1
repo.description: Optimized C library for EC operations on curve secp256k1

repo.name: secp256k1
repo.description: Optimized C library for EC operations on curve secp256k1

events.body: Rebased on the musig changes and added the compile options for cmake
Rebased to take into account the latest changes to cmake, CI and test framework.

verification.payload:
tree 058c08676458502d5227d50b23fe3afa9054815d
parent 8d445730ec79a9fa722eea59b6b697c3b9b1d501
author Fabian Jahr <fjahr@protonmail.com> 1719928819 +0200
committer Fabian Jahr <fjahr@protonmail.com> 1765925999 +0100

Experimental: Add incremental half-aggregation for Schnorr signatures

This includes addressing nits from the halfagg PR in secp-zkp:
- we may want to add a header to the include file that links to the BIP
- there's still a mention of aggsig_size
- we may want to move aggregate before inc_aggregate
- we should mention expected size of input aggsig array in_aggregate
- 'Should be aggsig_len = 32*(n+1)' -> 'Must be'

Co-authored-by: Benedikt <crypto@benedikt-wagner.dev>

events.message:
Experimental: Add incremental half-aggregation for Schnorr signatures

This includes addressing nits from the halfagg PR in secp-zkp:
- we may want to add a header to the include file that links to the BIP
- there's still a mention of aggsig_size
- we may want to move aggregate before inc_aggregate
- we should mention expected size of input aggsig array in_aggregate
- 'Should be aggsig_len = 32*(n+1)' -> 'Must be'

Co-authored-by: Benedikt <crypto@benedikt-wagner.dev>
